text: Thomas von Heesen (born 1 October 1961) is a former German football attacking midfielder. He is currently an assistant manager for Khoneh Be Khoneh. ==Coaching record== Team From To Record Arminia Bielefeld 17 August 1998 30 June 1999 1\. FC Saarbrücken 29 November 2000 17 September 2001 Arminia Bielefeld 17 February 2004 1 March 2004 Arminia Bielefeld 11 May 2005 11 February 2007 1\.
